attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/call-of-cygnus.png} tip={Call of Cygnus (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/brilliant-enlightenment.png} tip={Brilliant Enlightenment (3rd Job)} val={+60}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/elemental-harmony.png} tip={Elemental Harmony (Beginner Skill)} val={+1 per 2 levels}>

attackStats.name: Magic Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/elemental-expert.png} tip={Elemental Expert (Beginner Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/final-flame-elemental.png} tip={Final Flame Elemental (4th Job)} val={+3%}> <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/cygnus-blessing.png} tip={Cygnus Blessing (Link Skill)} val={+25}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/word-of-fire.png} tip={Word of Fire (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/spell-control.png} tip={Spell Control (2nd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/final-flame-elemental.png} tip={Final Flame Elemental (4th Job)} val={+40}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/pure-magic.png} tip={Pure Magic (4th Job)} val={+20}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/salamander-mischief.png} tip={Salamander Mischief (5th Job)} val={up to +105}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/word-of-fire.png} tip={Word of Fire (2nd Job)} val={+5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/burning-focus.png} tip={Burning Focus (3rd Job)} val={+30%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/natural-talent.png} tip={Natural Talent (1st Job)} val={+5% if Wand is equipped}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/glory-of-the-guardians.png} tip={Glory of the Guardians (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/burning-conduit.png} tip={Burning Conduit (4th Job)} val={+60%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/transcendent-cygnuss-blessing.png} tip={Transcendent Cygnus's Blessing (5th Job)} val={up to +120%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/liberated-magic.png} tip={Liberated Magic (3rd Job)} val={+25%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/pure-magic.png} tip={Pure Magic (4th Job)} val={+50%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} val={+8% while toggled}>

buffInfo.toggles: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-explosion.png} tip={Orbital Explosion (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame-range.png} tip={Orbital Flame - Range (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} dur={(30s cd)}>
buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction.png} tip={Blazing Extinction (4th Job)} dur={[10s](5s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/burning-conduit.png} tip={Burning Conduit (4th Job)} dur={[30s](45 - 30s cd based on remaining duration)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/salamander-mischief.png} tip={Salamander Mischief (5th Job)} dur={[60s / 30s Buff](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/phalanx-charge.png} tip={Phalanx Charge (5th Job)} dur={[70 Attacks](30s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-run.png} tip={Phoenix Run (3rd Job)} dur={[1800s](1800s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/burning-conduit.png} tip={Burning Conduit (4th Job)} dur={[30s](45-30s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-barrier.png} tip={Flame Barrier (4th Job)} dur={[15s / 10 Critical Abnormal Statuses](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-drive.png} tip={Phoenix Drive (Hyper Skill)} dur={[15s](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/glory-of-the-guardians.png} tip={Glory of the Guardians (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/empress-cygnuss-blessing.png} tip={Empress Cygnus's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[45s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.binds: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/cinder-maelstrom.png} tip={Cinder Maelstrom (3rd Job)} dur={[10s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/eternity.png} tip={Eternity (6th Job)} dur={[10s](360s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-run.png} tip={Phoenix Run (3rd Job)} dur={[3s / 1800s Buff](1800s cd revive)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/cataclysm.png} tip={Cataclysm (Hyper Skill)} dur={(100s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/eternity.png} tip={Eternity (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>
buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/ethereal-form.png} tip={Ethereal Form (5th Job)} dur={[3s](-MP | 60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/transcendent-cygnuss-blessing.png} tip={Transcendent Cygnus's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[45s](-5% | 120s cd)}>

details: Can be stacked up to 5 times, once for each unique Cygnus Knight to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Cygnus Knights' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach Lv. 10 and Ereve. You will see 5 NPCs on the left after talking to Neinheart. Talk to Oz to become a Blaze Wizard

build: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/natural-talent.png} tip={Natural Talent}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fire-repulsion.png} tip={Fire Repulsion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/firewalk.png} tip={Firewalk}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-elemental.png} tip={Flame Elemental}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-bite.png} tip={Flame Bite}>

<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flashfire.png} tip={Flashfire}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/spell-control.png} tip={Spell Control}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/word-of-fire.png} tip={Word of Fire}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/greater-flame-elemental.png} tip={Greater Flame Elemental}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/controlled-burn.png} tip={Controlled Burn}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-explosion.png} tip={Orbital Explosion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/greater-orbital-flame.png} tip={Greater Orbital Flame}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-vortex.png} tip={Flame Vortex}>

<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/brilliant-enlightenment.png} tip={Brilliant Enlightenment}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/burning-focus.png} tip={Burning Focus}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/grand-flame-elemental.png} tip={Grand Flame Elemental}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/liberated-magic.png} tip={Liberated Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-run.png} tip={Phoenix Run}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/cinder-maelstrom.png} tip={Cinder Maelstrom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/grand-orbital-flame.png} tip={Grand Orbital Flame}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-tempest.png} tip={Flame Tempest}>

<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/final-flame-elemental.png} tip={Final Flame Elemental}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/pure-magic.png} tip={Pure Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/final-orbital-flame.png} tip={Final Orbital Flame}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/call-of-cygnus.png} tip={Call of Cygnus}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fires-of-creation.png} tip={Fires of Creation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-barrier.png} tip={Flame Barrier}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/wild-blaze.png} tip={Wild Blaze}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/burning-conduit.png} tip={Burning Conduit}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/towering-inferno.png} tip={Towering Inferno}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction.png} tip={Blazing Extinction}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame-range.png} tip={Orbital Flame - Range}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame-guardbreak.png} tip={Orbital Flame - Guardbreak}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame-split-attack.png} tip={Orbital Flame - Split Attack}> Orbital Flame - Range, Guard Break and Split Attack_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction-add-attack.png} tip={Blazing Extinction - Add Attack}> Blazing Extinction - Add Attack_<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction-reinforce.png} tip={Blazing Extinction - Reinforce}> Blazing Extinction - Reinforce OR <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction-spread.png} tip={Blazing Extinction - Spread}> Blazing Extinction - Spread_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-drive.png} tip={Phoenix Drive (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction.png} tip={Blazing Extinction (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
The last skill from the Secondary Trio can be any skill as Blaze Wizard only has 5 skills to boost
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-bite.png} tip={Flame Bite (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-vortex.png} tip={Flame Vortex (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-explosion.png} tip={Orbital Explosion (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/flame-tempest.png} tip={Flame Tempest (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/cinder-maelstrom.png} tip={Cinder Maelstrom (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction.png} tip={Blazing Extinction (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/towering-inferno.png} tip={Towering Inferno (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/cataclysm.png} tip={Cataclysm (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-drive.png} tip={Phoenix Drive (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to TajMaJon for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Hyper Passive Build + Inner Ability

primary.name: Elemental Slash
primary.shortDesc: Damage: 130%, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Max Hits: 1

primary.name: Imperial Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, return to Ereve immediately.\nCooldown: 600 sec.

primary.name: Noble Mind
primary.shortDesc: Increases Empress's Blessing max level by 6
details: This skill is leveled up by completing quests from Neinheart after Lv. 125

primary.name: Elemental Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Intelligence increases 1 for every 2 levels the character gains

primary.name: Elemental Expert
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Elemental Shift
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 4, jumps further in the appropriate direction
details: Can be activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 200%, Number of Attacks: 1
primary.desc: Shoots a fireball which can be directed using the Arrow Keys
details: Initially, you can only fire one fireball

primary.name: Flame Bite
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 38, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Release a burst of flames forward

primary.name: Firewalk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Jump in the input direction.\n[Passive Effect - Defense: +100, Speed: +22, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20]
details: [Passive]: Grants flat DEF, Speed, and Jump
Modifies the appearance of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/elemental-shift.png} tip={Elemental Shift (Beginner Skill)}>

primary.name: Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +10
primary.desc: Using direct attacking skills will temporarily summon a Flame Elemental that provides a flat Magic Attack buff

primary.name: Fire Repulsion
primary.shortDesc: 85% of damage taken goes to MP instead of HP.

primary.name: Natural Talent
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Greater Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 1
details: Increases %Damage of attack and allows you to throw up to 2 projectiles

primary.name: Flame Vortex
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit with Knock-back Attack: 6
primary.desc: Pushes enemies back with a vortex of flames

primary.name: Orbital Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13\nWhen Orbital Flame, Phoenix Drive, Orbital Inferno, Inferno Sphere, or Eternity lands 10 times, the next Orbital Flame type skill will be an additional hit dealing 55% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: While active, upon landing 10 successful hits using the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/phoenix-drive.png} tip={Phoenix Drive (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-inferno.png} tip={Orbital Inferno (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/inferno-sphere.png} tip={Inferno Sphere (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/eternity.png} tip={Eternity (6th Job)}>, the next Orbital Flame-type skill will deal an additional attack
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Flashfire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45. Leaves a trail of fire that lasts 100 sec.\nUse the skill again to teleport to the trail's location. Teleport Cooldown: 2 sec.\nUse the skill again while holding the down key to replace the trail. Once replaced, you cannot replace the trail again for 1 sec.
primary.desc: Leave a flame at your position that you can teleport back to by pressing the Skill Key again
details: Pressing the Skill Key and Down Arrow Key together will replace the flame to your location

primary.name: Controlled Burn
primary.shortDesc:
Recovers 100% of your MP upon casting.
Cooldown: 60 sec
[Passive Effects: MP Absorb Chance: 22%, Amount Absorbed: 7% of Max HP
Amount Absorbed: 4% of the boss's Max MP]
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants your attacks a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP<bp_Effectiveness is reduced for bosses_>

primary.name: Word of Fire
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Attack Speed: +2, Critical Rate: +5%

primary.name: Greater Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +20
details: Increases Magic Attack provided

primary.name: Spell Control
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +10, Magic Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Grand Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 36, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 275%, Number of Attacks: 2. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +25%
Upon using 3 times, the next attack actives enhanced Grand Orbital Flame.
------Enhanced Orbital Flame------
MP Cost: 36, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 2, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +20%
details: Increases %Damage of attack and allows you to throw up to 3 projectiles
Now deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Using this skill 3 times enhances the next Orbital Flame

primary.name: Flame Tempest
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit with Knock-back AttacK: 8
primary.desc: Lashes out flames in both directions that pushes enemies back

primary.name: Cinder Maelstrom
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 12, Stun Duration: 10 sec\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Releases a circle of flames around you that binds enemies within it

primary.name: Phoenix Run
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Duration: 1800 sec, Teleports backward at the moment of impact to recover 50% HP, Ignore Damage Duration: 3 sec\nCooldown 1800 sec
primary.desc: When hit by a fatal attack, teleport backwards and heal back a percentage of your HP back
details: You are briefly invincible after recovering
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Grand Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +30
details: Increases Magic Attack provided

primary.name: Liberated Magic
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: +130%, Final Damage: +25%

primary.name: Burning Focus
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Brilliant Enlightenment
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases INT by 60 and Knockback Resistance by 40%.

primary.name: Call of Cygnus
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, awakened Empress appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Cygnus Knights' Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Final Orbital Flame
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 43, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 2. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +50%
Upon using 3 times, the next attack activates enhanced Final Orbital Flame.
------Enhanced Orbital Flame------
MP Cost: 36, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 430%, Number of Attacks: 2, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +40%
-------------Flame Fox-------------
MP Cost: 43, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 570%, Number of Attacks: 2\Upon landing 10 times, Fox Mischief Debuff Duration: 20 sec
--------Enhanced Flame Fox--------
MP Cost: 43, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 630%, Number of Attacks: 2
details: Increases %Damage of attack and allows you to throw up to 4 projectiles
Increases additional %Damage against regular monsters
Increases %Damage of enhanced attack

Attack has different effects when <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fires-of-creation.png} tip={Fires of Creation (4th Job)}> Flame Fox is summoned<bp_Fires a non-returning fireball that deals increased %Damage, and Number of Attacks and when this skill hits an enemy 10 times, 'Fox Mischief' debuff is applied (up to 5 stacks)_[Fox Mischief]: Upon 5 stacks, using <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/towering-inferno-2.png} tip={Towering Inferno (4th Job)}> Fox Mode consumes debuff and triggers an additional attack_>

primary.name: Blazing Extinction
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40
Duration: 10 sec, Damage: 310%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
Cooldown: 5 sec
Using this skill triggers the cooldown for Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
------Flame Fox Version------
MP Cost: 40
Duration: 3 sec, Damage: 375%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max enemies Hit: 8, can attack up to 10 times
Cooldown: 30 sec
Using this skill triggers the cooldown for Blazing Extinction Lion Mode
primary.desc: Only usable when <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fires-of-creation.png} tip={Fires of Creation (4th Job)}> is active. The attack will differ depending on which animal was summoned
details: [Blazing Lion]: Launches a fireball that slowly moves and attacks nearby enemies
[Flame Fox]: Releases a continous blast of flames forward
Both attacks trigger cooldowns for both skills and Flame Fox version is unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Towering Inferno
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 115, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 15
Cooldown: 30 sec
------Flame Fox Version------
MP Cost: 22, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 630%, Number of Attacks: 6
Landing on enemy with 5 stacks of Fox Mischief deals additional attack with 1824% damage 13 times
Cooldown: 30 sec
When a direct attack skill lands, cooldown decreases 0.6 sec.
primary.desc: Only usable when <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fires-of-creation.png} tip={Fires of Creation (4th Job)}> is active. The attack will differ depending on which animal was summoned
details: [Blazing Lion]: Releases a blast of fire at your location that deals increased %Damage and Number of Attacks

[Flame Fox]: Fires a fireball that deals reduced %Damage and Number of Attacks, however deals a devastating additional attack to enemies with 5 stacks of Fox Mischief<bp_Successful direct attack skills reduce the cooldown of this skill by 0.6 sec_>
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will activate the attack of the opposite form

primary.name: Fires of Creation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 115, Duration: 300 sec, MP Consumption: +105%, Ignore Defense: +30%
details: Pressing the Skill Key will summon a Blazing Lion
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together summons a Flame Fox

<tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/towering-inferno.png} tip={Towering Inferno (4th Job)}> will have different effects based on the spirit summoned

primary.name: Burning Conduit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 115, Duration: 30 sec, Damage: +60% and Attack Speed: +1, Party Member Damgae: +40%, and Attack Speed: +-1 stages when you are on the pentacle.\nYou can receive the same effects outside the pentacle, but party members need to be on the pentacle.\nCooldown: 45 sec, cooldown -1 for every remaining second if pentacle disappears before the duration ends. Can be decreased up to 15 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a zone that increases %Damage and Attack Speed (by 1 stage) while within the zone
details: While active, you always receive the effects, however party members must stay within the zone to receive the effects<bp_The amount of %Damage increased for party members is also reduced_>
Cooldown is reduced if Burning Conduit ends early (-1 sec for every remaining sec, up to 15 sec)

primary.name: Flame Barrier
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Duration: 15 sec, Number of Debilitating Status Condition Blocks: 10\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks up to 10 Critical Abnormal Status effect

primary.name: Final Flame Elemental
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 8 sec, Magic ATT: +40\n[Passive Effect: Magic ATT +3%]
details: Increases Magic Attack provided
Now permanently increases %Magic ATT

primary.name: Pure Magic
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Final Damage: +50%, Magic Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Wild Blaze
primary.shortDesc: Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

hyperPassive.name: Orbital Flame - Range
details: While toggled, increases travel distance of <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Phoenix Drive
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Duration: 15 sec, enhances Orbital Flame
[Blazing Lion] - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 2, Flame Launched: 3. When several flames attack a single enemy, starting with the second flame, Final Damage: -50%, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +40%
[Flame Fox] - Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 2, Flame Launched: 4. When several flames attack a single enemy, starting with the second flame, Final Damage: -50%
Cooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: Upon use, enhances <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}> with additional fireballs and has different effects based on <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fires-of-creation.png} tip={Fires of Creation (4th Job)}> spirit summoned
details: [Blazing Lion]: Deals reduced %Damage and launches fewer fireballs, however deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
[Flame Fox]: Deals increased %Damage and launches an extra fireball
Additional fireballs deals reduced %Final Damage after the first fireballs

hyperActive.name: Cataclysm
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 860%, Number of Attacks: 7, invincible during casting motion\nCooldown: 100 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a large fireball that damages enemies in a large area
details: You are invincible while casting

hyperActive.name: Glory of the Guardians
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nOnly Cygnus Knights and Mihile in the party receive the effect\nCooldown: 120 sec

fifthMain.name: Orbital Inferno
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 250, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 935%, Number of Attacks: 6, Ignore Enemy DEF: 50%\nCooldown: 5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Hurls out a giant fireball which can be directed using the Arrow Keys
details: Attack has additional %Ignore Def
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Savage Flame
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Passive Effects: Gain 1 Flame Charge when normal enemy is hit 1 times, boss is hit 25 times, or boss is defeated 1 times with Blaze Wizard's direct skill attack, up to 6 flames.
Active Effect - MP Cost: 500, Flame Cost: 2+ charges, Cooldown: 20 sec
[Blazing Lion]: Activates explosion 12 times, hitting up to 15 enemies for 660%. Flames remain for 18 sec, triggering explosions against up to 5 enemies who are caught in the flames. Each explosion attacks up to 3 enemies for 600% damage 5 times. Each enemy can trigger an explosion up to 5 times.
Increases Final Damage by 35% for every Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
[Flame Fox]: Maintained up to 5 sec. Creates 8 foxfires that strike 8 enemies within range. Each foxfire deals 800% damage and can regenerate up to 7 times. Regenerates 2 more time for each 1 Flame Charge over the minimum cost.
fifthMain.desc: Only usable when <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/fires-of-creation.png} tip={Skill Fires of Creation (4th Job)}> is active. The attack will differ depending on which animal was summoned
details: Striking an enemy with a direct attack skill 1 time or a boss 25 times grants 1 Flame Charge (up to 6)

[Lion Attack]: Launches forward dealing massive damage and increases %Final Damage depending on remaining Flame Charges<bp_Minimum of 2 Flame Charges is required to cast_The attack leaves a flame zone that damages enemies within it (up to 5 times per enemy)_>

[Fox Attack]: Creates fireballs that attack nearby enemies. The fireballs will regenerate and attack again depending on how many Flame Charges were used to cast<bp_Attack prioritizes bosses with highest Max HP first_>
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will activate the attack of the opposite form

fifthMain.name: Inferno Sphere
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 75 per sec., consumes 1 Phoenix Feather
Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1210%, Number of Attacks: 8, Additional Critical Rate: +50%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%
1 Phoenix Feather will be prepared every 12 sec. You can have up to 10 feathers.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: While held, creates a flame circle that damages enemies within
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and %Ignore Def
Attacks uses a special resource called 'Phoenix Feathers' gained every 12 seconds (up to 10 feathers)
Costs 1 feather every second to cast

fifthMain.name: Salamander Mischief
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, Salamander Summon Duration: 60 sec, Damage: 360%, Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 7. In a single action, consumes 100 MP and attacks by bouncing up to 12 times.
Obtain Ember every time Salamander's attack hits. Final Damage of Salamander's attack increases by 1% for every 1 Ember. Up to 45 Ember can be obtained.
When Salamander disappears, Magic ATT increases by 15 for 30 sec, and Magic ATT additionally increases by 2 for every 1 Ember.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons a salamander that continuously pounces at a single target upon successful attacks
details: The salamander will return to you after attacking 12 times or if you travel too far away

Upon striking an enemy, it gains 1 Ember that increases the %Final Damage of the attack<bp_The max amount of Embers that can be collected increases based on the Skill Level_When the salamander disappears, gain a Magic Attack buff based on the amount of Embers collected_>
Prioritize boss monsters and enemies with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.name: Orbital Flame Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Orbital Flame First Four Versions Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Orbital Explosion Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Flame Tempest Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Cinder Maelstrom Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Blazing Extinction Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Towering Inferno Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Cataclysm Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Phoenix Drive Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/orbital-flame.png} tip={Orbital Flame (1st Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Orbital Flame
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 440%, Number of Attacks: 2. Damage Against Normal Monsters: +50%
Upon using 3 times, the next attack activates enhanced HEXA Orbital Flame, which creates a flame 4 times that attacks up to 6 enemies for 620% damage 9 times every 15 seconds
------Enhanced Orbital Flame------
MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 675%, Number of Attacks: 2, Damage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
-------------Flame Fox-------------
MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 760%, Number of Attacks: 2
Upon landing, Enemy Elemental Resistance: -10%. Upon landing 10 times, Fox Mischief Debuff Duration: 20 sec
Every 15 seconds, creates flame 4 times that attack up to 6 enemies with 620% damage 9 times at regular intervals
--------Enhanced Flame Fox--------
MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 945%, Number of Attacks: 2
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/cygnus-knights/blaze-wizard/blazing-extinction.png} tip={Blazing Extinction (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Blazing Extinction
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 44
Duration: 10 sec, Damage: 1030%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8,
Attacks one enemy up to 4 times
Cooldown: 5 sec
Using this skill triggers the cooldown for Blazing Extinction Fox Mode
------Flame Fox Version------
MP Cost: 44
Duration: 3 sec, Damage: 830%, Number of Attacks: 12, Max enemies Hit: 8, can attack up to 10 times
Cooldown: 30 sec
Using this skill triggers the cooldown for Blazing Extinction Lion Mode
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Eternity
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting\nFlame occurs 38 times which attacks up to 15 enemies with 2100% damage 10 times, a Flame of the Cycle that attacks up to 15 enemies for 3700% damage 13 times at regular intervals for 30 seconds occurs\nCooldown: 360 sec

meta: Blaze Wizard is an INT mage class part of the Cygnus Knights. Blaze Wizard are known for their unique playstyle of juggling fireballs to attack
